channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ADL launches ‘Mamdani Monitor’ to track NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani over antisemitism concerns
item.description: The ADL’s new “Mamdani Monitor" targets Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani over antisemitism concerns, but some Jewish groups say the move is unfair.

item.title: Rockefeller Center’s Christmas Tree cut down in upstate New York, standing a towering 75 feet tall
item.description: The 11-ton tree was loaded onto a 100-foot-long trailer as scores of people turned out for the occasion.

item.title: Trump administration seeks to block full SNAP payments for November

item.title: Viktor Orban slams Biden administration: 'Everything was rigged'
item.description: Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban ripped the Biden administration while praising President Trump's policies as the two met at the White House.

item.title: Pelosi Was Bad. What Follows Could Be Worse
item.description: The San Francisco progressive was the most effective Democratic legislator since LBJ.

item.title: This Horror Story Of An IVF-Addicted 68-Year-Old Is Everything Wrong With Big Fertility
item.description: Two toddlers are effectively orphans after the 68-year-old who commissioned them using others’ DNA and another woman’s womb faces felonies.

item.title: Talks stall on ending shutdown, as Senate to vote again on paying federal workers

item.title: If Republicans Don’t Focus On The Economy, They’ll Lose In The Midterms Too
item.description: If Republicans don’t pass a tangible agenda over the next 12 months, they will face another electoral reckoning next fall.

item.title: Yes, Ozempic for All
item.description: Trump’s deals to expand access to obesity drugs amount to a win-win-win.

item.title: Florida cites mafia law, hits Planned Parenthood with suit over claim abortion pill 'safer than Tylenol'
item.description: Florida accuses Planned Parenthood of racketeering over chemical abortion marketing, seeking massive damages in unprecedented legal challenge.

item.title: Cornell University to pay $60M in deal with Trump administration to restore federal funding

item.title: Sydney Sweeney Handles Hack Journos Better Than Most Republicans
item.description: Handling hacktastic journos isn't that difficult. It just takes fortitude and the willpower to refuse playing by their rules.

item.title: Hertz sees 20% spike in one-way rentals amid air traffic chaos
item.description: America seems to be hitting the road as its air fleet is increasingly grounded.

item.title: Nigerian Girls Are Being Kidnapped
item.description: Islamic terrorists have inflicted a decade of religiously motivated sexual violence on Christian women and girls.

item.title: Asian universities turn into tourist destinations as Chinese students look closer to home for higher education
item.description: Tourists have long flocked to Western universities, like Oxford or Harvard—but visitors are now adding Asian campuses to their itineraries.
